EmailTemplate.description: Email sent to grad applicants who withdraw their application
EmailTemplate.name: AM 3.3 Grad Withdrawal
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Associate Mentor application has been withdrawn
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Your application has been withdrawn Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
We can confirm that your application has been withdrawn on {!Job_Application__c.LastModifiedDate} . With kind regards,
NCS Graduates Team The Challenge graduates@the-challenge.org
